name: DUE
description:
Due is a short first person horror, climbing  / walking simulator.

In the far future, take control of someone tasked with appeasing the Gods to regain their tribe's life source - water.

Made for the 48 hour Haunted PS1  Wretched Weekend Jam.

Follow me on Twitter here >> https://twitter.com/_rubeki

Controls:

WASD - Move

Shift - Run

Spacebar - Jump

Jump into a wall to start climbing

Move around while climbing with WASD

When on a wall, point to where you want to jump and press  Spacebar to jump off

ESC - return to menu, or quit
